fields.name: Action
fields.description: Actions to perform on the request and response if all of the match conditions are met.

fields.name: MatchConditions
fields.description: A list of match conditions that must meet in order for the actions of this rule to run. Having no match conditions means the actions will always run.

fields.name: MatchProcessingBehavior
fields.description: If this rule is a match should the rules engine continue running the remaining rules or stop. If not present, defaults to Continue.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A name to refer to this specific rule.

fields.name: Priority
fields.description: A priority assigned to this rule.
